fields.template: Thanks for purchasing Bajaj Bike. Your Customer ID is {customer_id}. Please furnish the same for every free service.
fields.description: Send registration confirmation message to customer

fields.template: VIN: {vin} Coupon: {usc} Valid days: {valid_days} Valid kms: {valid_kms}. Please provide the UCN# to the service advisor at the time of vehicle delivery only.
fields.description: Send customer service detail with product and valid coupon id

fields.template: Successfully register PRODUCT ID: {0} INTO CUSTOMER ID: {1}
fields.description: Send on product registration confirmation

fields.template: No service register for Customer Id: {sap_customer_id}
fields.description: Send on if customer id is not valid

fields.template: Please proceed for free service {service_type} for Customer ID {customer_id}
fields.description: Send on valid coupon id

fields.template: Cannot proceed for Free Service {service_type} for Customer ID {customer_id}, as DAYS/KMS has exceeded
fields.description: Send on invalid coupon id and it also contain next valid coupon id

fields.template: Invalid ID or No Free service coupon available for this product
Invalid service type: {service_type}
Congratulations for availing Free Service {service_type}. Your Unique Coupon Number is {coupon}. Please provide this number at the time of delivery only.Happy Riding
fields.description: Send coupon validation sms to customer also

fields.template: Information provided by you is invalid for Free Service {service_type}
fields.description: Send coupon invalid sms to customer also

fields.template: Wrong COUPON ID:{0}
fields.description: Send wrong coupon

fields.template: Unauthorized dealer:{0}
fields.description: Send message when dealer not authorized

fields.template: Reminder: Your Coupon {usc} for product {vin} will expire on {expired_date} having valid kms {valid_kms}
fields.description: Send reminder sms on coupon expiry

fields.template: Service Completion for Customer ID {customer_id} and FSC {usc} tagged into the system. Thank You
fields.description: Send sms on coupon completion

fields.template: Invalid message For any assistance please contact our customer care at 9999999999
fields.description: Send sms when received message is invalid

fields.template: CUSTOMER ID: {sap_customer_id} VIN: {vin}
fields.description: Send the brand data detail

fields.template: {email_id} {name}
fields.description: Receive message template from customer for registration

fields.template: {sap_customer_id}
fields.description: Receive this message template when customer request for his/her service

fields.template: {sap_customer_id} {kms} {service_type}
fields.description: Receive this message when SA send to check the coupon status

fields.template: {sap_customer_id} {usc}
fields.description: Receive this message from SA for coupon close

fields.template: {brand_id}
fields.description: Receive this message from Customer for all brand procduct detail

fields.template: Supported keyword: 1.GCP_REG 2.SERVICE 3.BRAND 4.A 5.C 6.SD
fields.description: Send supported message format to customer

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Congrats on your purchase of Bajaj bike. Your customer id is {sap_customer_id}. Refer this id during servicing.
fields.description: Send message to customer on purchase

fields.template: Incorrect Customer ID or UCN
fields.description: Send message to SA reg wrong Customer-Id or wrong UCN

fields.template: No Digitised FSC available for Customer ID {0}
fields.description: Send when there is no UCN or all UCN are closed

fields.template: Your one time password is {0}
fields.description: Send OTP

fields.template: Incorrect UCN
fields.description: Send message to SA reg wrong UCN

fields.template: Incorrect Customer ID
fields.description: Send message to SA reg wrong Customer-Id

fields.template: Thanks for providing feedback. We will get back to you soon.
fields.description: Send this message when service advisor files complain successfully

fields.template: Receive this message when service advisor files complain}
fields.description: Receive this message when service advisor files complain

fields.template: You have been assigned this task.
fields.description: You have been assigned this task.

fields.template: Your feedback has been assigned to one of our techincian is is looking into it.
fields.description: Your feedback has been assigned to one of our techincian is is looking into it.

fields.template: Your Complaint has been resolved.
fields.description: Your Complaint has been resolved.
